TopicTitle: Kerbin infrastructure (cities, roads, rails), night lights

Articles.Content:
Hi folks,

i am playing KSP for a long time and i missing one thing, infrastrucure on kerbin. Kerbin is just the same wasteland planet as any other.

I suggest to make some cities, roads and other infrastructure. Part of this can be some collision system. For example, if your part (rocket or debris) hit a city, player will be alerted and later maybe penalised (if money system of KSP comes into force). This will make a whole game more interesting, player will be force to more carefully plan a mission Those infrastructures also should glow during night like in real (like on picture below).

I offer myself as a volunteer. I am quite experienced 3D artist and programmer. If from developers will be a interest, i can spent some time by creating my sugestion.

With regars, Jan

It's here, under 'scenery and graphics'. Penalising the player for crashing into them is also kinda suggested in there as well, but it's just for the space center-could easily be applied to cities as well.

Ouch, sorry about that. I missed it on wiki
